notes:
component for empty states.
Introduced a shell script to automate setup of commit tooling and templates.
Added support for viewing and managing shared courses via the sidebar and new API endpoint.
Improvements

Enhanced breadcrumb navigation to adapt for shared courses across multiple pages.
Updated empty results messaging to support dynamic labels.
Improved update experience with a streamlined, single-modal flow and clearer update feature display.
Bug Fixes

Fixed lesson title validation to consider course ID for uniqueness checks.
Chores

Standardized commit message formatting with Commitizen, commit templates, and simplified commit hooks.
Updated Tauri app version to 2.4.8.
